data.name: Rain
text: It's so hot as usual...
Time to check what things I need to do today.
Let's go talk to Cecilia below. She should be in her usual spot beside the lake.

data.name: Cecilia
text: Hey Rain, are you still having those dreams? You seem to get them a lot ever since you went missing in that cave a few years back.

data.name: Rain
text: Ah yeah… That day I was playing hide-and-seek with you but ended up falling into a cave. The cave was very, very dark, but there was something shining in the middle, a black crystal.
Out of curiosity I tried to touch it, but I can’t seem to recall what happened after that..

data.name: Cecilia
text: Oh, I remember that day… After you went missing, the whole village set out in the forest to look for you! And we just found you sleeping in a field.

data.name: Rain
text: I wonder what happened then…

data.name: Cecilia
text: Anyway, the number of slimes in the forest seems to be increasing lately, and they appear to be more aggressive. The chief requested you to help thin out their numbers.

data.name: Rain
text: Sure, leave it to me!

data.name: Cecilia
text: Be careful out there!

data.name: Rain
text: Alright, that should settle things for now. Hmmm, since I’m here, maybe I should look for some of Cecilia’s favorite flowers. I’m sure it’ll be a pleasant surprise for her.

data.name: Rain
text: Hmm? What’s that crystal? Let’s take a closer look..
The black wisp flickered, it’s voice weakening as it faded out.

data.name: Shadow
text: Young hero, my power is fading...
Find the other fragments… before the world is destroyed.
The black wisp vanished into the ground overlapping the young hero’s shadow.

data.name: Rain
text: What was that?! Was that my… memories from when I was in the cave?
And who are you, or rather, what are you!? Why do you look like me?

data.name: Shadow
text: I have no idea… I can’t remember anything…
But… I feel some sort of connection to you… Do you know anything about me?

data.name: Rain
text: (thinking to himself) Is he the black wisp I saw in the cave? But he doesn’t remember anything… Argh there’s too many questions and no answers. Maybe I should bring him back with me first?
Alright, honestly I have no clue as to who and what you are. But since you seem to be connected to me, how about you come with me? Not that you seem to have a choice though… What’s your name?

data.name: Shadow
text: I’ll… follow you. As for a name, I don’t remember at all.

data.name: Rain
text: Hmmm… Then I’ll call you Pancakes! Listen here Pancakes, my dream is to become a top-tier adventurer with lots of gold to spare. Let’s explore the world together and find some treasure!

data.name: Rain
text: Ah, where did these slimes appear from! This is going to be troublesome.

data.name: Pancakes
text: I think I can aid you in battle. I can’t recall much of where I came from, but I can fight. Let me help you.

data.name: Pancakes
text: You can use my ultimate with the V or Q button! That'll make life easier.

data.name: Rain
text: Wow Pancakes, you’re pretty strong! Well that should be alright for now, let’s head back to the village first, otherwise Cecilia’s going to get worried.

data.name: Cecilia
text: There seems to be some sort of commotion in the forest today. The chief requested you to check if there’s anything out of the ordinary that might have caused this.

data.name: Rain
text: I’ll take care of it!

data.name: Cecilia
text: Don’t push yourself too much alright! Just check things out and come back safely Rain.

data.name: Rain
text: I got it I got it~

data.name: Rain
text: Woah, it’s… a dungeon? It wasn’t here before.. A dungeon just opened up next to the village?

data.name: Pancakes
text: There’s something mysteriously familiar about this place…
I feel… as if it’s calling out to me to go in…

data.name: Rain
text: Could the appearance of this dungeon be linked to Pancakes? It appeared the day after I found another crystal in the forest…
I think I might find some answers as to what Pancakes is in here. But it might be dangerous, so we should make more preparations before entering. I need to let the village know as well.

data.name: Elder
text: What, a dungeon appeared next to our village?! Hmmm…….
This might be a chance for the village to earn more money, dungeon loot is pretty valuable… Alright, I’ll prepare an expedition party to explore the dungeon.

data.name: Rain
text: Elder, could I join the expedition too?

data.name: Elder
text: No, it is too dangerous, we don’t know what might be in there yet. We’ll wait for the party to explore the dungeon first before we decide anything else.
That’s the end of the discussion. Go back and rest, Rain. You’ve worked hard these few days. I will inform the village of the dungeon shortly.

data.name: Rain
text: Alright…
It has been a week after the expedition party has left for the dungeon.
The village had not heard from them again.
The village elder sent a messenger to the Empire and the Adventurer’s Guild to seek help in exploring the dungeon and finding out what happened to the expedition party.
Meanwhile, the village elder has forbidden everyone from entering the dungeon.

data.name: Pancakes
text: Rain… The dungeon’s call is getting stronger. I can feel the darkness within the dungeon growing. Something bad is going to happen at this rate.
